fields.description:
Tapping on 'Remote Streaming' table row gives us application error page on Windows Phone(Mango).

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the sound table row.
7.Now tap on the 'remote streaming' table row.
7.You will see that nothing happens & we do not get any child pages,but an application error page.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on 'Remote Streaming' table row gives us application error page on Windows Phone(Mango).

Expected result:
1.Tapping on sound table row should give us a child page with buttons"Start streaming","Pause Streaming","Unpause Streaming","Stop Stream","Small buffer", "Default buffer" and "Large buffer" on it.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->Sound-->Remote Streaming:Tapping on 'Remote Streaming' table row gives us application error page on Windows Phone(Mango).
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
